name: Youtube Video Sitemap generator
author: Accrue

sections.description:
If you have any feature requests I’d be more than happy to implement them just open up a thread on github please:

https://github.com/vimes1984/video_sitemap/issues

All errors to be tracked via github please: https://github.com/vimes1984/video_sitemap

This is a little plugin to automatically scan a sites post content and metavalues for youtube liniks and automatically generate a video_sitemap.xml.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Youtube Video Sitemap generator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install via the plugin repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
None yet

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload Youtube Video Sitemap generator to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install via the plugin repository.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.

short_description: Scan your site for youtube links in both post content and meta tags and create a xml video sitemap file on the fly.
description:
If you have any feature requests I’d be more than happy to implement them just open up a thread on github please:

https://github.com/vimes1984/video_sitemap/issues

All errors to be tracked via github please: https://github.com/vimes1984/video_sitemap

This is a little plugin to automatically scan a sites post content and metavalues for youtube liniks and automatically generate a video_sitemap.xml.

screenshots.caption: Pick your post type from the back end administrator interface.
Then either view your newly created file or manually edit where needed.
